description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky from the legendary Adam Wood. In this episode, it serves as the gathering place where the crew learns about Brook's connection to Laboon.

keyEvents.title: Crew Discusses Laboon
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats gather on the Thousand Sunny to discuss their earlier encounter with Laboon at Twin Capes.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the crew learns about Brook's promise and decides to recruit him.

keyEvents.title: Franky's Emotional Reaction
keyEvents.description: Franky breaks down in tears on the Thousand Sunny after hearing Laboon's story.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the emotional impact of Brook's story on the crew.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Declares Brook Will Join
keyEvents.description: Luffy declares on the Thousand Sunny that Brook will definitely become their musician.
keyEvents.significance: The moment Brook is unanimously accepted as a future crewmate.

keyEvents.title: Crew Prepares for Counterattack
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats prepare to depart the Thousand Sunny to launch their assault on Thriller Bark.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of the climactic battle phase.

statusHistory.reason: Ship is operational and anchored near Thriller Bark

description: The massive Gothic mansion at the center of Thriller Bark island-ship, where many of Gecko Moria's zombie army reside. In this episode, it's the location of Brook's desperate battle with Ryuma.

keyEvents.title: Brook vs Ryuma Continues
keyEvents.description: Brook continues his intense duel with Ryuma in the mansion.
keyEvents.significance: The setting for Brook's fight to reclaim his shadow.

keyEvents.title: Ryuma Cuts Brook's Afro
keyEvents.description: Ryuma damages Brook's precious afro during their battle in the mansion.
keyEvents.significance: A devastating moment that strikes at Brook's identity.

keyEvents.title: Brook's Vow
keyEvents.description: Brook vows to return to Laboon while fighting in the mansion.

keyEvents.title: Ryuma Stabs Brook
keyEvents.description: Ryuma delivers a critical strike to Brook in the mansion.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the desperate stakes of the battle.

statusHistory.reason: Mansion is operational and housing many battles
